description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=0/3. In this comedy role playing game you play the part of a young love starved man whose hopes are sparked to life on meeting a beautiful girl!  Will you make it up to her apartment? Will you get to see her excusive lingerie fashion show? Will you find Love? Loads of randomly set variables so as game is different every time you play! includes 3D version(you will need red/blue 3D glasses)
